revised_title: A Study of Barometer, Thermometer, and Rain Data from Lyndon in Rutland, South Lambeth in Surrey, Selbourn and Fyfield in Hampshire (1785)
tldr: This article presents a detailed record of barometer, thermometer, and rain data from various locations in England during 1785. The author observes the impact of frost, drought, and rainfall on the environment, crops, and wildlife, and discusses the variations in seasonal patterns over time.
